title: Voltaic
description: A web app that allows users to sign up and find electric vehicle charging stations and also allows them to share their home charger

title: hodlsell
description: A crypto currency web app that allows users to track crypto currencies and view a chart of the crypto's price history

title: Apple E-Commerce
description: An Apple inspired eCommerce web app that lets users register and sign in to add items to their cart/checkout. Once a user successfully checks out, they can then go to their account profile and view their transaction history

title: Sticksy
description: Sticksy is a web app built with React that lets users create and store notes
